title: President will not resign under any circumstances - Johnston
body_lines: President Gotabaya Rajapaksa will not resign under any circumstances and the government will face the present national crisis, Chief Government Whip Johnston Fernando informed Parliament a short while ago.
Johnston said the President was elected following a mandate given to him by 6.9 million people.
“As a responsible government, President Gotabaya Rajapaksa will not resign from under any circumstances,” Minister Fernando said.
